installWeb3MobileBrowser: 请使用支持web3的移动浏览器访问我们（例如Trust Wallet或Coinbase Wallet）。
installMetamask: 在Chrome或Brave上安装Metamask后访问我们。
betaWarning: 该项目处于beta版，使用需自担风险。
searchOrPaste: 搜索通证名称，符号或地址
unknownError: 糟糕！未知错误。请刷新页面或使用其他浏览器或设备访问。
differentToken: 它必须是一个不同的通证。
noRecipient: 输入要发送的钱包地址。
invalidRecipient: 请输入一个有效的钱包地址来接收。
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: 输入一个{{inputCurrency}}或{{label}}的值以继续。
totalSupplyIs: 当前流动性通证的总供应量是
youAreSettingExRate: 您正在将初始汇率设置为
totalSupplyIs0: 当前流动性通证的总供应量为0。
tokenWorth: 以当前汇率，每个Pool中的通证值
firstLiquidity: 您是第一个添加流动性的人！
initialExchangeRate: 初始汇​​率将根据您的充值来设定，请确保您的ETH和{{label}}充值具有同样的法币价值。
label: 标签
name: 名称
brokenToken: 所选通证与Uniswap V1不兼容，增加流动性将导致资金被冻结。
toleranceExplanation: 降低此限制会降低您交易成功的概率。但是，这增加了由正常的价格波动而失败的机会。
addingLiquidity: 添加流动性时，您会收到代表您在流动池中所占份额的LINKSWAP流动池通证（LSLP）。如果在该列表中未有看到您加入的流动池，请尝试在下面导入。
removingLiquidity: 从池中移除通证，您的头寸将按当前汇率转换为基础通证，与您在流动池中的份额成比例。累计费用包含在收到的金额中。
connectToSeeLiquidity: 连接到钱包以查看其流动性。
dontSeeJoinedPool: 看不到您加入的流动池？
creatingAPair: 增加流动性后，您会收到代表您头寸的LINKSWAP通证（LSLP）。这些通证自动赚取与您在组中所占份额成比例的费用，可以随时兑换。
importingAPool: 使用此列表查找未自动出现在界面中的对。
youAreCreatingAPool: 您正在创建一个流动池
firstLiquidityProvider: 您是第一位流动性提供者。
ratioSetsPrice: 您添加的通证比例将设置该流动池的价格。
selectCurrencies: 开始之前请选择以下通证
cannotCreatePool: 无法创建流动池，请选择另一个交易对。
estimatedOutput: 交易预估，如果价格变化超过{{slippage}}％，您的交易将被撤消。
happyToSupply: 如果您对该价格满意，请点击查看供应。
initialPricesAndShare: 初始价格和流动池份额
tokenlist: 通证列表是ERC20令牌列表的开放规范，您可以通过在下面输入其URL来使用任何令牌列表。请注意，第三方令牌列表可能包含虚假或恶意的ERC20令牌。
expertModeDisclaimer: 专家模式会禁用交易确认请求并启用高差价交易，这通常会导致差价和资金损失。
useOnOwnBehalf: 仅当您知道自己在做什么时，才可使用此模式。
expertModeAbout: 绕过确认方式且允许进行高差价交易，注意后果自负。
slippageToleranceDisclaimer: 如果价格的变化超过此百分比，您的交易将被撤消。
enterValidSlippage: 输入有效的滑动百分比
transactionDeadlineDisclaimer: 如果您的交易待处理时间超过此时间，则撤消该交易。
youDontHaveLiquidityYet: 您在该流动池中未有份额。
yourTransactionsWillApearHere: 您的交易记录将在这显示…
commonBasesDescription: 这些通证通常被其它通证来兑换
anyoneCanCreateAToken: 任何人都可以在以太坊上创建一个任意名字的ERC20通证, 包括创建一个已经存在的通证的假币以及一个还未发币的项目。
loadingArbitraryToken: 该接口可加载任意地址的通证。 当您与任意通证进行兑换的时候请多加小心。
tokenWarning: 如果您购买了任意一个通证，您有可能无法卖出以换回您原来的通证
outputIsEstimatedBuy: 预估可得。您将至少可得 {{atLeast}} {{currencySymbol}}或者交易返回。
outputIsEstimatedSell: 预估可得。您将最多可得 {{atMost}} {{currencySymbol}} 或者交易返回。
transactionWillRevertDescription: 如果数量太多交易可能返回, 在确认前可能会有对您不利的价格。
priceImpactDescription: 市场价和您的价格由交易规模决定
liquidityProviderFeeDiscription: 每一笔交易费用的(0.30%)将给流动性提供者
confirmThisTransaction: 在您的钱包中确认该交易
routeDescription: 您的交易将经过这些路径
connectToFindPools: 寻找兑换池前请先连接钱包。
selectATokenToFindLiquidity: 选择一个通证来寻找流动性。
priceDescription: 现价来自于最近的区块
buyTotalDescription: 一共需要支付。 这是一个预估的金额，可能与Wyre的估计有所不同。
currentWyrePrice: Wyre 上一个 {{currencySymbol}} 的价格
wyrePriceDescription: 该 {{currencySymbol}} 在Wyre的实时价格。可能与交易所的实时售价有所不同。
walletConnectDisclaimer: 要购买 {{currency}} ({{currencySymbol}}), 你需要连接一个支持web3的钱包比如 Metamask、Trust Wallet或者Coinbase Wallet。这个钱包将用来接收您的{{currencySymbol}}.
transactionFeeDescription: 费用将取决于Wyre。当您进行购买的时候，在确认前您将有一个固定的汇率。
networkFeeDescription: 网络费用将由发送 {{currencySymbol}} 时通过的以太坊网络产生。
invalidEmail: 这必须是一个有效地邮箱地址。
purchesProcessByWyre: 您的购买将通过Wyre，请在一个新的浏览器页面完成。
undefinedError: 抱歉，这是一个未知的错误。
invalidFormError: 抱歉，格式错误。请重新填写。
limitHint: 您的购买可能超过<1>周购买限制</1>通过Wyre。
gdprDisclaimer: 备注：yflink不存储客户信息，信息仅有您和Wyre了解。
stakeLPTokenDescription: 通过 {{currencyASymbol}} | {{currencyBSymbol}} LINKSWAP 流动性通证 (LSLP) 你将赚取抵押奖励
unstakeLPTokenDescription: 通过解押您的 {{currencyASymbol}} | {{currencyBSymbol}} LINKSWAP 流动性通证 (LSLP) 你将不再获取抵押奖励
stakePoolsDescription: 抵押你的 LINKSWAP 流动性通证 (LSLP) 并赚取每日收益
myStakeablePositionsDescription: 你已经解押了这些流动池中的 LINKSWAP 流动性通证 (LSLP)。
onlyShowYourStakePools: 只显示您抵押的流动池
insufficientStakedCurrencyBalance: 没有足够的 {{ inputCurrency }} 抵押余额
unstakeAndClaimRewardsOnPool: 解押并领{{currencyASymbol}} | {{currencyBSymbol}} LP Token的奖励
linkcheckDescription: This coin has successfully completed LINKCHECK Verification.
stablecoinDescription: A stablecoin is a class of cryptocurrencies that attempts to offer price stability and are backed by a reserve asset.
baseDescription: The home currency for LINKSWAP and the Varen ecosystem.
noSearchResult: No token was found for your search input. Please check to make sure the token name or contract address exists
paymentDisclaimer: Listing new token pairs on LINKSWAP is subject to a listing fee, which goes directly to the treasury. Listing fees can be paid in ETH (eq. $3000), LINK (eq. $2500) or YFL (eq. $2000)
pairCreationApprovals: Approvals needed for the Pair Creation
insufficientLiquidityForRuglock: In order to receive a RugLock badge for the new token pair, a minimum liquidity of {{minimum}} {{currencySymbol}} has to be added
insufficientLiquidityForPairCreation: To create a new pair, a minimum liquidity of {{minimum}} {{currencySymbol}} is required
pairCreationDisclaimer: Transaction successful and sent to LINKSWAP Pair-Factory. Please allow for some time for the new pool to show. A confirmation will be shown here when the pool is live. Please check transaction on Etherscan if confirmation does not appear
insufficientTokenBalanceForFee: Your {{currencySymbol}} balance is too low to pay for the listing fees. Please select a different Creation-Fee Currency
pairCreationSuccess: New Pair successfully created! Start Trading or visit the pair statistics by clicking the link below. If the RugLock option was selected, the listed Token will receive a badge (based on selected lockup period), once it's listed in the Token list.
walletConnectDisclaimerBridge: To mint and burn Tokens, you need to connect a Web3 wallet such as Metamask, Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
mintDescription: You can mint {{outputCurrency}} by sending {{inputCurrency}} to an automatically generated Gateway Address. These addresses are only valid for 24 hours! Click 'Mint' to generate a Gateway Address associated with your wallet.
onlyDepositOnce: Gateway Addresses should only be used to deposit funds one-time. If you send multiple deposits to this Gateway Address the funds can be lost.
burnDescription: You can burn your {{inputCurrency}} by sending {{inputCurrency}} to the burn Contract Address. Select the amount of {{inputCurrency}} you want to burn and the corresponding {{outputCurrency}} will be sent to the {{outputCurrency}} Wallet Address you entered.
noStakePools: No active LP Reward Pools found
routeAbout: Show the swap routes for all of your transactions
bridgeWarning: Please read carefully before you proceed
bridgeDisclaimer: It should be clear that if you make a mistake while using the renBridge (sending funds to the wrong address, depositing multiple TXs, etc.) that your funds are permanently lost (as with any other blockchain mistake). RenVM is a new technology and security audits don't completely eliminate risks. Please don’t supply assets you can’t afford to lose.
bridgeAbout: If you closed or reloaded the minting interface, before sending the minted tokens to your ERC-20 Wallet. Just click on the 'Mint' button again to see your transaction and the button that sends the minted funds to your wallet.
deposit88IntoVaultDescription: 88mph is a fixed-rate yield-generation protocol. At the moment, 88mph uses a linear model for determining the fixed interest rate offered to depositors. 88mph keeps track of the Exponential Moving Average (EMA) of the underlying yield protocol's APY over roughly a monthly window, and offers 75% of the EMA as the fixed rate.
deposit88IntoVaultStep1: Deposit {{currencySymbol}} which will be put into DeFi yield protocols such as Compound, Aave, and yEarn.
deposit88IntoVaultStep2: After depositing in the pool, you receive a ERC-721 non-fungible token that represents your deposit. You may transfer it to another account, or even sell it on NFT markets such as OpenSea.
deposit88IntoVaultStep3: By depositing into 88mph, you earn MPH tokens, which are continuously vested to you for 7 days.
deposit88IntoVaultStep4: By staking your MPH, you can claim your share of rewards from the 88mph reward pool where the protocol fees and yield-farming rewards are collected.
deposit88IntoVaultStep5: When your lending period is over, you withdraw your principal together with the fixed-rate interest earned. When you withdraw, you need to return 30% of the MPH tokens received at the time of deposit.
deposit88Description: After depositing in the pool, you receive a ERC-721 non-fungible token (NFT) that represents your deposit. You can see the positions represented by the ERC-721 NFT listed below.
deposit88WithdrawEarly: If the Lending period of one of your deposits isn't over yet, you can choose to "withdraw early". You will then withdraw your principal before the maturation date by giving up your interest & MPH rewards.
noDepositsFound: No active 88mph deposits for this vault.
unstakeAndClaimRewardsOnSinglePool: Unstake all and Claim Rewards on {{currencyASymbol}} Pool
bridgesRenDescription: Transfer crypto currencies from different blockchains onto the Ethereum blockchain, with our RenVM implementation
renDescription: Choose a bridge and transfer your crypto currencies between their blockchain and the Ethereum blockchain
addMemo: Add this memo to your transaction
bridgeConclusion: Please be patient! The minting process can take up to 24 hours because RenVM needs to wait for a safe amount of blockchain confirmations (to prevent double spend, etc).
renCoinDescription: This coin is part of the RenVM Ecosystem.
oldListUpdate: The token list "{{listName}}" has been updated to {{version}}.
listUpdate: An update is available for the token list "{{listName}}" ({{oldListVersion}} to {{newListVersion}}).
stakeGovernanceDescription: Stake to earn rewards and exercise your power on the future of Varen by voting on proposals
stakeGovernanceBalanceDisclaimer: Collected fees will be converted to {{inputCurrency}} periodically and unannounced
stakeGovernanceStakeDescription: When you stake your VRN into the Governance vault, you'll recieve yVRN. This represents your staking share. The yVRN price increases after each reward distribution. Unstaking converts your yVRN back to your original amount of VRN staked plus distributed rewards.
stakeGovernanceUnstakeDescription: You can unstake your yYFL at any time. Your yYFL will be converted back to YFL. Note that there is a 1% unstaking fee if you unstake before 172,800 blocks (approximately 26 days) from your time of staking, which will go to the treasury.
currentEstimatedAPYDisclaimer: Current estimated APY is based on {{days}}-day vault performance
currentEstimatedTotalAPYDisclaimer: Current total APY is based on the vault performance since its creation {{days}} days ago
stakeGovernanceVotingDescription: With your staked YFL in the Governance Vault you can vote on community proposals that determine the direction of the LINKSWAP protocol.
stakeSingleTokenDescription: By staking your {{currencyASymbol}} you will be eligible to earn staking rewards
unstakeSingleTokenDescription: By unstaking your {{currencyASymbol}} you will no longer be eligible to earn staking rewards
